title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for considering h'(x) = 0

1 point is earned for identifying critical point and endpoints as candidates

1 point is earned for the answers

h ′ (x)= f ′ (x)− g ′ (x)= e x − 1 x =0 x=0.567143 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@545D@

Absolute minimum value and absolute maximum value occur at the critical point or at the endpoints.

h(0.567143) = 2.330

h(0.5) = 2.3418

h(1) = 2.718

The absolute minimum is 2.330.

The absolute maximum is 2.718.
